name: Dark Forester
description: Feel like a lord. Build and decorate your own forest. Place guardians, own heroes, lay traps and protect livestock from enemy hordes in this hardcore RPG strategy, Dark Forester.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4790K Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia series with 3GB GDDR5 or better, ATI Radeon 3GB GDDR5 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700K Memory: 32 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia series with 4GB GDDR5  or better, ATI Radeon with 4GB GDDR5 or better Storage: 5 GB available space
